name: Online Class and Exam Scheduling System class_sched.php文件跨站脚本漏洞
product: ["Online Class and Exam Scheduling System Online Class and Exam Scheduling System 1.0"]
description: Online Class and Exam Scheduling System是一个在线课程和考试安排系统。Online Class and Exam Scheduling System存在跨站脚本漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/Scheduling/pages/class_sched.php中class参数缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。目前没有详细的漏洞细节提供。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://code-projects.org/
